text: He imana vali'o! Inasapha ute cagi adola rahina vale ate alaha de la'i gavahi dena vale bano. Cahe uha tuhade, tuhade mata- pita jam risatedaram de virudha (hi ki'um na) hove. Jekara ko'i dhanavana jam niradhana hai, tam alaha tuhade tom zi'ada dovam da hitaisi hai. Isa la'i tusim ichavam da palana na karo, ki inasapha tom hata javo. Jekara tusim hera phera karoge jam apana pakha baca'uge tam jo kujha tusim kara rahe ho, alaha usa to janu hai
